about_the_game:
The result of forbidden genetic manipulation and warped by super science, wreak havoc on humanity. Mutate your giant monster with devastating attacks, unlock new permanent evolutions, and an ever expanding roster of kaijus. Devastate procedurally generated cities inflicting as much damage possible before you succumb to your injuries and show humanity the true face of destruction!

A Monstrous Menagerie

Pick from a variety of giant monsters with their own weaknesses, strengths, and unique weapons to destroy humanity!

Grow Stronger Every Life

Give your kaiju new and varied evolutions that can simply boost their baseline stats or give them interesting tactical options as they rampage across the globe.

Destruction Has It's Benefits

Mad science isn't cheap, turn the untold destruction you wreak into funds for your mad science research projects. Unlocking new skins for your kaiju, new locations to destroy, and interesting accessories.

short_description: Crush, smash, and eat thousands of enemies showing humanity what the meaning of destruction is! Kaiju Catastrophe is an arcade game with roguelite mechanics. Mutate devastating weapons, unlock permanent evolutions, and wreak havoc with a variety of monsters to tear humanity apart!
